00020 #ifndef OPENRAVE_CONTROLLER_H
00021 #define OPENRAVE_CONTROLLER_H

00023 namespace OpenRAVE {
00024 
00028 class OPENRAVE_API ControllerBase : public InterfaceBase
00029 {
00030 public:
00031     ControllerBase(EnvironmentBasePtr penv) : InterfaceBase(PT_Controller, penv) {
00032     }
00033     virtual ~ControllerBase() {
00034     }
00035 
00037     static inline InterfaceType GetInterfaceTypeStatic() {
00038         return PT_Controller;
00039     }
00040 
00045     virtual bool Init(RobotBasePtr robot, const std::string& args) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00046         if( !robot ) {
00047             return false;
00048         }
00049         std::vector<int> dofindices;
00050         for(int i = 0; i < robot->GetDOF(); ++i) {
00051             dofindices.push_back(i);
00052         }
00053         return Init(robot,dofindices,true);
00054     }
00055 
00061     virtual bool Init(RobotBasePtr robot, const std::vector<int>& dofindices, int nControlTransformation) = 0;
00062 
00064     virtual const std::vector<int>& GetControlDOFIndices() const = 0;
00065 
00069     virtual int IsControlTransformation() const = 0;
00070 
00071     virtual RobotBasePtr GetRobot() const = 0;
00072 
00075     virtual void Reset(int options) = 0;
00076 
00081     virtual bool SetDesired(const std::vector<dReal>& values, TransformConstPtr trans=TransformConstPtr()) = 0;
00082 
00086     virtual bool SetPath(TrajectoryBaseConstPtr ptraj) = 0;
00087 
00090     virtual void SimulationStep(dReal fTimeElapsed) = 0;
00091 
00098     virtual bool IsDone() = 0;
00099 
00101     virtual dReal GetTime() const OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00102 
00106     virtual void GetVelocity(std::vector<dReal>& vel) const OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00107 
00111     virtual void GetTorque(std::vector<dReal>& torque) const OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00112 
00113     //        Specifies the controlled degrees of freedom used to control the robot through torque In the
00114     //        general sense, it is not always the case that there's a one-to-one mapping between a robot's
00115     //        joints and the motors used to control the robot. A good example of this is a
00116     //        differential-drive robot. If developers need such a robot, they should derive from RobotBase
00117     //        and override these methods. The function that maps control torques to actual movements of
00118     //        the robot should be put in SimulationStep.  As default, the control degrees of freedom are
00119     //        tied directly to the active degrees of freedom; the max torques for affine dofs are 0 in
00120     //        this case.
00121     //    virtual void GetControlMaxTorques(std::vector<dReal>& vmaxtorque) const;
00122     //    virtual void SetControlTorques(const std::vector<dReal>& pTorques);
00123 
00124 private:
00125     virtual const char* GetHash() const {
00126         return OPENRAVE_CONTROLLER_HASH;
00127     }
00128 };
00129 
00134 class OPENRAVE_API MultiController : public ControllerBase
00135 {
00136 public:
00137     MultiController(EnvironmentBasePtr penv);
00138     virtual ~MultiController();
00139 
00141     virtual bool Init(RobotBasePtr robot, const std::vector<int>& dofindices, int nControlTransformation);
00142     virtual const std::vector<int>& GetControlDOFIndices() const;
00143     virtual int IsControlTransformation() const;
00144     virtual RobotBasePtr GetRobot() const;
00145 
00151     virtual bool AttachController(ControllerBasePtr controller, const std::vector<int>& dofindices, int nControlTransformation);
00152 
00154     virtual void RemoveController(ControllerBasePtr controller);
00155 
00157     virtual ControllerBasePtr GetController(int dof) const;
00158 
00159     virtual void Reset(int options);
00160     virtual bool SetDesired(const std::vector<dReal>& values, TransformConstPtr trans=TransformConstPtr());
00161     virtual bool SetPath(TrajectoryBaseConstPtr ptraj);
00162     virtual void SimulationStep(dReal fTimeElapsed);
00163 
00165     virtual bool IsDone();
00166 
00168     virtual dReal GetTime() const;
00169 
00170     virtual void GetVelocity(std::vector<dReal>& vel) const;
00171 
00175     virtual void GetTorque(std::vector<dReal>& torque) const;
00176 
00177 protected:
00178     RobotBasePtr _probot;
00179     std::vector<int> _dofindices, _dofreverseindices;

00181     std::list<ControllerBasePtr> _listcontrollers;
00182     std::vector<ControllerBasePtr> _vcontrollersbydofs;
00183     ControllerBasePtr _ptransformcontroller;
00184     TrajectoryBasePtr _ptraj;
00185     mutable boost::mutex _mutex;
00186 };
